text: Jiaru nimen zaoshou chuangshang [he shahai], name, bu xinyang de minzhong que yi zaoshoule tongyang de chuangshang [he shahai]. Wo [an la] shi zhexie hao yun [shengli] zai renlei jian lunliu, yibian an la bianbie chu [nimen zhong] naxie shi xinshi, bing cong nimen zhong xuan chu lieshi. An la jue bu xihuan bu yi zhe.
